description:
Add link to codewalks to the Documentation landing page.

Fixes issue 1281.

messages.text:
http://codereview.appspot.com/3150041/diff/2001/doc/docs.html File doc/docs.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/3150041/diff/2001/doc/docs.html#newcode55 doc/docs.html:55:

Codewalks

On 2010/11/18 23:57:06, adg wrote: > I'd insert this above Go for C++ programmers, as the codewalks have a wider > target audience. Done. http://codereview.appspot.com/3150041/diff/2001/doc/docs.html#newcode57 doc/docs.html:57: Guided tours through Go features. On 2010/11/18 23:57:06, adg wrote: > s/through/of/ > s/features/programs/ Done.

Hello adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change.

Thanks for this. http://codereview.appspot.com/3150041/diff/2001/doc/docs.html File doc/docs.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/3150041/diff/2001/doc/docs.html#newcode55 doc/docs.html:55:

Codewalks

I'd insert this above Go for C++ programmers, as the codewalks have a wider target audience. http://codereview.appspot.com/3150041/diff/2001/doc/docs.html#newcode57 doc/docs.html:57: Guided tours through Go features. s/through/of/ s/features/programs/

Hello adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2527b7111a43 ***
